How It Works

HOW IT WORKS

Finding Internships on GradSkills is Fast, Easy & Secure

01

Post

Explain what you need to get done & by when

Posting a job is fast, easy and free. Just describe your project, set a budget and hit "Post". Wait for applicants to come to you, or browse talent and invite favorites directly to your project.

  • See how you can tailor posts to you needs
    Posting a job is simple yet flexible, with features to let you target the support you need, including:

    • Hire by task, or hire by week/month

      You can choose to hire for a discreet task or to hire on a recurring weekly / monthly basis.

    • Choose deadlines

      For task-based projects, define when you need work completed.

    • Flexible budget

      Set a budget range to target talent and decide on a final rate after evaluating candidates.

    • Applicant criteria

      Choose your preferred criteria for applicants, including skills, degree level, location & more.

02

Hire

Call or message top applicants & hire the best

Review applicant profiles and message favorites directly through GradSkills. Meet candidates remotely to discuss your project & evaluate fit, or hire the best candidate on the spot with a single click.

  • Explore how you can find the perfect intern

    Yes. See applicants' prior experience & project portfolio, plus see ratings and reviews from prior Gradskills clients.

03

Work

Collaborate, share & manage work flow remotely.

Manage your projects 100% remotely using the tools your team is comfortable with. Structure workflow & communication around your schedule, and get results when you need them.

  • Discover the added flexibility of milestones

    Set task- or hourly-based milestones for each project, which determine what must be done and by when.

04

Pay

Pay securely only when you're satisfied with results.

Fund each project milestone via secure escrow before commencing work, and release payment only when work is complete and you've approved it. Then move on to the next milestone.

  • Learn more about how payment works

    Funding milestones ensures a safe environment for all sides. Funds are only released once you approve work.

Getting Started on Gradskills is

Quick & Simple
  • Step 1

    Select a Category

    Choose a category for your first job post. You can see available interns in the category you selected & browse profiles right away.

  • Step 2

    Post a Job & Register

    Describe your job and hit 'Post'. When you post your first job, you'll be prompted to create your free account - this is also quick & easy.

  • Step 3

    Start Hiring

    That's it - now you're ready to start hiring! Let interns come to you, or browse interns and invite favorites to apply to your job directly.

As simple as that.

FEES

Gradskills FeesIt's free to join, hire & recruit

  • Free to Join

    It's free to join Gradskills - there are no sign-up costs & no membership fees

  • Free to Hire

    It's free to post jobs & hire interns, and it's free to recruit for full-time positions.

  • Small Processing Free

    A processing fee of approx. 2% is charged on transactions.

    More info

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Is it safe to hire student interns remotely?

    When you hire students on GradSkills, you get the benefit of the latest innovations in remote work security trusted by millions of clients on top professional freelance platforms, including standard contracts, pay-as-you-go milestones and secure escrow payment. Work can only begin once you've authorized it, and payment is released once you approve deliverables.

  • What tools do I need to manage my projects on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • What is the employment status of interns I hire on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • Can I hire unpaid interns on GradSkills?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

  • Can I hire interns on an hourly basis if I need ongoing support?

    All you need to manage projects is your email and any additional tools that you and your team already use to collaborate. You don't need to learn any new software, and you don't need to worry about compatibility across platforms. Just work how you normally work, and let GradSkills handle the admin.

Privacy Policy

What You'll Get:

  • Post unlimited jobs
  • Invite unlimited students directly to jobs
  • Add unlimited students to your Talent Pool for new projects or recruitment
  • Free access to any new premium features we roll out in the future

Posting a job is fast and easy.

Describe what you need done, set your budget and select an optional deadline. Choose to pay by task or by week / month, depending on your project needs.

Hit “Post” and wait for offers to come to you, or browse talent and invite favorites to apply directly.

Select various filters to pre-screen applicants, including location, degree level (i.e., Bachelor, Masters, PhD), degree focus, graduation year, and more.
